conversation.speaker: USER
conversation.text: I'm in the mood for a action movie. Could you recommend a few?

conversation.speaker: SYSTEM
conversation.text: I've got just the thing for you! I'd highly recommend "John Wick" - it's a non-stop adrenaline rush with some of the most impressive action sequences in recent memory, and Keanu Reeves' stoic performance is perfectly suited to the role. If you're looking for something a bit more explosive, "Mad Max: Fury Road" is an adrenaline-fueled ride that will keep you on the edge of your seat from start to finish!
